      • setButton

        private javax.swing.JButton setButton(java.lang.String title,
                            int fmLeft,
                            int fmTop)
        This function is used by the constructor to create and position all the various buttons
        Parameters:
        fmLeft - an integer representing the number of pixels from the left of the frame
        fmTop - an integer representing the number of pixels from the top of the frame
        title - a string object representing the title that will be place on the button
        Returns:
        btn a JButton object to be placed on the form

      • setCombobox

        private javax.swing.JComboBox setCombobox(java.lang.String firstItem,
                                int fmLeft,
                                int fmTop)
        This function is used to create a combobox on the form.
        Parameters:
        fmLeft - an integer representing the number of pixels from the left of the frame
        fmTop - an integer representing the number of pixels from the top of the frame
        firstItem - a string object representing the contents that will be placed in the label
        Returns:
        cbo a JComboBox that will be placed at the specified location
